Name: Drunk or Dead
About the game: VR shooter Drunk or Dead immerses you in a post-apocalyptic world where you will fight against countless zombies. Weapons and alcohol will help you. You will be in for exciting and dynamic competitive gameplay: hordes of enemies, dangerous bosses, and a sea of alcohol - as it's the only way to save yourself from zombie virus! * Shoot! Hit! Blow up! - stand against bloodthirsty enemies at any price! * Drink! Drink! Drink! - in this game, alcohol is not only harmful but useful too! * Walk through the line of a riveting plot to discover locations to dare your friends in survival mode. * Become the best killer of undead among your friends or worldwide, if everything mentioned above isn't enough for you.
